医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加利福尼亚州球孢子菌病季节动态及其气候决定因素研究表明干旱条件抑制了球孢子菌病的季节性。然而，从干旱到潮湿的转变可能会导致加州出现更明显的季节性高峰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Coccidioidomycosis-seasonal-dynamics-and-their-climate-determinants-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Coccidioidomycosis-seasonal-dynamics-and-their-climate-determinants-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07d93ed4-4d51-454e-a60f-de1daf3beaa4 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 08:29:00 -0400 Coccidioidomycosis seasonal dynamics and their climate determinants in California
鸡蛋消费与女性认知能力下降速度减缓有关食用鸡蛋对老年人认知功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Egg-conspiration-linked-to-slower-cognitive-decline-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Egg-conspiration-linked-to-slower-cognitive-decline-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9be30cf-3502-49b3-a43d-581ea03e5831 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 08:22:00 -0400 Egg consumption linked to slower cognitive decline in women
研究发现另外 31 种癌症可能与肥胖有关这项研究确定了 18 种潜在的与肥胖相关的癌症，揭示了与 BMI 的显着关联，并强调了肥胖对癌症风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Research-identizes-31-additional-cancers-pottially-linked-to-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Research-identizes-31-additional-cancers-pottially-linked-to-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e273dc9-d309-4317-88dc-53e0813df13b Thu, 22 Aug 2024 08:04:00 -0400 Research identifies 31 additional cancers potentially linked to obesity
Azenta Life Sciences 的 Genewiz 在 Genewiz 周活动中庆祝科学发现 25 周年2024 年 GENEWIZ 周标志着多组学解决方案诞生 25 周年，其中包括研讨会、奖励计划以及为研究界提供的交流机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Genewiz-From-Azenta-Life-Sciences-Celebrates-25-Years-Of-Advancing-Scientific-Discoveries-At-Genewiz-Week-Event.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Genewiz-From-Azenta-Life-Sciences-Celebrates-25-Years-Of-Advancing-Scientific-Discoveries-At-Genewiz-Week-Event.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9535bc1-212a-4b9f-86b6-6e56fe96e230 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 06:32:00 -0400
研究表明细颗粒物暴露与妊娠期糖尿病风险增加有关研究人员评估了细颗粒物暴露与妊娠期糖尿病风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-links-fine-pativity-matter-exposure-to-increased-risk-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-links-fine-pativity-matter-exposure-to-increased-risk-of-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16ff7fd3-b05c-49b2-a692-41cbac7ca3d1 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 03:31:00 -0400 Study links fine particulate matter exposure to increased risk of gestational diabetes
数字内容之间的不断切换实际上会增加无聊感研究人员调查了数字媒体（例如社交媒体平台上的短视频）之间或内部的切换如何影响无聊感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/How-constant-switching- Between-digital-content-may-actually-increase-boredom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/How-constant-switching- Between-digital-content-may-actually-increase-boredom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e1cbae8-a816-4c51-b3a8-6c6ddab950a7 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 03:25:00 -0400 How constant switching between digital content may actually increase boredom
应对 Mpox：全球疫情、研究创新和治疗策略2024 年 8 月，由于非洲和瑞典 I 型 Mpox 病例不断增加，世界卫生组织宣布 Mpox（以前称为猴痘）为全球卫生紧急事件，突显了全球协调努力监测和减轻病毒传播的紧迫性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Responding-to-Mpox-Global-outbreak-research-innovations-and-therapeutic-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Responding-to-Mpox-Global-outbreak-research-innovations-and-therapeutic-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c9345b8-ab1a-4c9e-a570-1b5445e1a2e6 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 02:12:00 -0400 Responding to Mpox: Global outbreak, research innovations, and therapeutic strategies
Python 非凡的生理学可能会带来新的医学突破研究人员给禁食28天的蟒蛇喂食相当于其体重25%的食物，并将它们与没有喂食的蛇进行比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Pythons-remarkable-physiology-could-lead-to-new-medical-breakthroughs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Pythons-remarkable-physiology-could-lead-to-new-medical-breakthroughs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e09e4fbb-e34c-405e-a341-a7df3e6acd90 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 02:00:55 -0400 Python's remarkable physiology could lead to new medical breakthroughs
严重的 COVID-19 对心理健康的持续影响一项对 1800 万人健康数据进行检查的新研究显示，未接种疫苗的人在感染严重的 COVID-19 后的一年内，精神疾病的发病率更高。疫苗接种似乎可以减轻 COVID-19 对精神疾病的不利影响。布里斯托大学领导的研究于 2024 年 8 月 21 日发表在《美国医学会杂志精神病学》上，根据诊断后的时间和疫苗接种状况调查了 COVID-19 与精神疾病的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/The-lingering-mental-health-effects-of-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/The-lingering-mental-health-effects-of-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0d4e5cb-c7a4-45f7-9be5-65718c47da79 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 01:58:50 -0400 The lingering mental health effects of severe COVID-19
DNA 清道夫分解抗生素抗性基因近一个世纪以来，科学家们一直在与抗生素耐药微生物进行斗争。密歇根州立大学的研究人员表示，他们已经找到了一种预防这种情况的新方法——在废水处理厂中释放“DNA 清除剂”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/DNA-scavengers-break-down-antibiotic-pressive-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/DNA-scavengers-break-down-antibiotic-pressive-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6483483-f04d-484c-909c-b495f662fea7 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 01:56:46 -0400 DNA scavengers break down antibiotic-resistant genes
